/*
 * hotelPalama.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: Aug 16, 2014
 *      Author: abhinay
 */
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int T , N , Q , j , i , flag = 0;
	long long int booking[5000][2] , request;
	cin >> T;
	while(T > 0){
		flag = 0;
		cin >> N >> Q;
		for(i = 0 ; i < N ; i++){
			for(j = 0 ; j < 2 ; j++){
				cin >> booking[i][j];
			}
		}
		while(Q > 0){
			flag = 0;
			cin >> request;
			for(i = 0 ; i < N ; i++){
				for(j = 0 ; j < 1 ; j++){
					if((request >= booking[i][j]) && (request <= booking[i][j+1])){
						cout<< "NO"<<"\n";
						flag = 1;
						break;
					}
				}
				if(flag == 1){
					break;
				}
			}
			if(flag == 0){
				cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
			}
			Q--;
		}
		T--;
	}
	return 0;
}
